t = int(input())
out = []
for i in range(t):
    (a, b, c, d) = map(int, input().split())
    (x, y, x1, y1, x2, y2) = map(int, input().split())
    x += b - a
    y += d - c
    if a + b > 0 and x1 == x2:
        out.append('No')
    elif c + d > 0 and y1 == y2:
        out.append('No')
    elif x1 <= x <= x2 and y1 <= y <= y2:
        out.append('Yes')
    else:
        out.append('No')
res = '\n'.join(out)
print(res)

import sys
readLine = lambda : sys.stdin.readline()
readInt = lambda : int(sys.stdin.readline())
readInts = lambda : [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split(' ')]

def main():
    solns = []
    t = readInt()
    for _ in range(t):
        (a, b, c, d) = readInts()
        x_disp = b - a
        y_disp = d - c
        (x, y, x1, y1, x2, y2) = readInts()
        good = 'Yes'
        if x2 == x1 and (a > 0 or b > 0):
            good = 'No'
        elif y2 == y1 and (c > 0 or d > 0):
            good = 'No'
        elif x_disp + x > x2 or x + x_disp < x1:
            good = 'No'
        elif y_disp + y > y2 or y_disp + y < y1:
            good = 'No'
        solns.append(good)
    print('\n'.join(solns))
main()

from sys import stdin
input = stdin.readline
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (a, b, c, d) = map(int, input().split())
    (x, y, x1, y1, x2, y2) = map(int, input().split())
    ab = a - b
    cd = c - d
    flag = 'Yes'
    if ab == 0 and x1 == x2 and (not a == b == 0):
        flag = 'No'
    if not x1 <= x - ab <= x2:
        flag = 'No'
    if cd == 0 and y1 == y2 and (not c == d == 0):
        flag = 'No'
    if not y1 <= y - cd <= y2:
        flag = 'No'
    print(flag)

test_cases = int(input())
for test in range(test_cases):
    line = input().split(' ')
    (a, b, c, d) = [int(i) for i in line]
    line = input().split(' ')
    (x, y, x_1, y_1, x_2, y_2) = [int(i) for i in line]
    horizontal = abs(a - b)
    vertical = abs(c - d)
    if (a > 0 or b > 0) and x_1 == x_2 or ((c > 0 or d > 0) and y_1 == y_2):
        print('No')
    elif (a >= b and x - horizontal >= x_1 or (b > a and x + horizontal <= x_2)) and (c >= d and y - vertical >= y_1 or (d > c and y + vertical <= y_2)):
        print('Yes')
    else:
        print('No')
